name: Sampahn (Atokad)
description:
Hello!

Sampahn is a game created during the Jamfuser.

It's a two player cooperative sailing game where players take control of a junk - a ship from China and South East Asia. Clean up the seas and fight deadly monsters infuriated by the polluted state of the oceans... just try not to sink in your beat-up junk!

It is not quite finished yet.
